name: CloudGame (Browser playable)
description:
UPDATE: Browser playable version: https://fisher007.itch.io/cloudgame-web

You can find a small instruction image in the game's menu to help you with your first steps.
The goal of the game is to transform (wink wink) your clouds into a big storm cloud.  Blow your small clouds above the forests so they can grow from the rising water vapor. Once they turn big and opaque you, can combine them and form a storm cloud. Be careful where you form the storm clouds, because you can't blow them away. 
After watering the forests, you need to blow the cloud away to let the forest regenerate with the help of a little sunlight and be ready to grow your next cloud.
If there are farms near by, make sure to water them from time to time, because if the crop dries out, the farmers will abandon it and cut down the nearest forest to make a new farm.
Avoid the nasty cities at all cost!

Download, run the CloudGame.exe
Controls:  walk with the WASD keys, hold down the SHIFT key to sprint,  hold down the left mouse key to charge up your blow
